layer at (0,0) size 800x600
  LayoutView at (0,0) size 800x600
layer at (0,0) size 800x72
  LayoutBlockFlow {test} at (0,0) size 800x72
    LayoutBlockFlow {p} at (0,16) size 800x40 [color=#008000]
      LayoutBR {br} at (0,0) size 0x19
      LayoutText {#text} at (0,20) size 152x19
        text run at (0,20) width 152: "This line should be green."
